body.name: Belkin Thunderbolt 4 Cable (1M, 3.3ft Power Cable), USB-C to USB-C Cable w/ 100W Power Delivery, USB 4 Compliant, Compatible with Thunderbolt 3, MacBook Pro, eCPU & More - Intel Thunderbolt Certified
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Inuma.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 14 mins
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 12 hrs 44 mins.
features: THE LATEST THUNDERBOLT TECHNOLOGY - Giving you top-tier connectivity in a full-featured Belkin charger cable. Also find a Thunderbolt 4 Cable available in 2M/6.6ft length
SINGLE CABLE SOLUTION - Our thunderbolt 4 charging cable supports data, power & video- a one-cable solution for your power hub, macbook pro, or any other compatible device
THUNDERBOLT CERTIFIED: This usb-c to usb-c cable is backwards compatible with Thunderbolt 3, USB 4, USB 3.2, & USB 2.0 provides fast data transfer and charging capabilities
LIGHTNING FAST SPEEDS - This 1M/3.3ft active Belkin reversible type c to type c cable supports up to 40 Gbps of bandwidth & 8K video at 30hz- move data faster than ever!
UP TO 100W POWER DELIVERY- Access up to 100W with our Power Delivery enabled cable for a fast charge to your connected devices. Power laptops, smartphones, tablets & more!
body.description: A smarter, faster charging cable. Meet the next generation of Thunderbolt technology- the Belkin Thunderbolt 4 Cable. 8 times faster than USB 3.0, this power cable makes multitasking across multiple devices effortless. Charge your Macbook pro, Samsung smartphone, Galaxy Tablet, eCPU, while on the go with our Belkin usb c cable. Our certified Thunderbolt 4 cable is fully compatible with Thunderbolt 3, USB 4, USB 3.2, and USB2.0, giving you connectivity in a full-featured, 1M/3.3ft power cable. Get access to up to 40 Gbps of bandwidth with our active Thunderbolt 4 reversible Type-C Cable. Achieve ultra-fast data transfer speeds, up to 8K@30hz video, and up to 100W of Power Delivery— all at the same time, and with one cable! Transferring data between numerous devices at up to a staggering 40Gbps has never been easier. Plug this type c to type c cable into your docking station for fast charging and high-speed data transfers. With a length of 2M/6ft, these Belkin charging cables make it convenient to use multiple products at the same time- no need to look for multiple outlets in the same area! This 100W usb c cable can be paired with our Belkin USB C Docking Stations.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: High Speed, Data Transfer, Fast Charging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent cable, I wanted to connect my Dell Precision 7780 to my Dell U3423WE monitor, with a single cable, which was the monitor cable, the network cable and the USB C hub of the monitor, which when I arrived at the office alone It was necessary to connect a Thunderbolt cable to the laptop without having to buy a hub, so the cable had to be Thunderbolt 4 and due to the space on my desk, with a length of almost two meters. I didn't want to spend a fortune on it, but at the same time I wanted a guarantee that it will work. This Belkin cable was the solution, optimal performance and a reasonable price. Definitely recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: Item is exactly as described. Works great. Arrived quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works where others failed.
reviews.reviewText: Used to hook rtx 2080 video card with thunderbolt output to Apple pro xdr display. Apple's cable didn't work!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely flexible, and works as expected.
reviews.reviewText: I’m using this to connect a MacBook Pro to one of two Dell 4K displays. Compared to the 1-meter USB-C cable that came with the monitor, this Belkin cable is thinner, lighter, and more flexible. And twice as long, of course. The cable sheath has a matte finish with a soft feel. It’s a nice cable! Works as expected for 4K60 video + USB data.The plugs do feel a little less solidly snug than other USB-C cables I own — they have just a bit of wiggle if you try to shift them around when plugged in, but they don’t slip out. I can see this worrying someone who has to move things around a lot, but it isn’t a problem for my system that stays on my work desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent cable. works great for my external GPU, cable quality could be better
reviews.reviewText: This cable is actually a lot thicker than the usual type c cable but I assume this is because of the thunderbolt capability. Unlike many other cables, this is not made of nylon fiber which actually made it get frayed and damaged a bit easier. You do get a longer length so you can be sure that the cable will provide you a good amount of slack. I could actually go a bit further with my laptop. I do not have to be right next to the external GPU which is great. It works pretty well with my external GPU and laptop. The cable has a pretty reliable feel and connections. This cable works well with thunderbolt port. You can plug it into a thunderbolt device or any type c port. Another thing about the cable is able to sync and charge my device without issues. It has no connection issues which is great for this laptop. Even if you happen to tap the cable a little bit, it does not lose connection. It does take a bit of force to plug the cable into the laptop and device the first few times. For charging, be aware that the actual charging capacity of the cables are dependent more on what outlet you are using. If you are using a fast charging port or a wall outlet you will actually get a faster charge then you would from a laptop USB. When plugged directly into my mac, it actually charges pretty quickly but again depends on the outlet you are using. The cable do not have any issues with heating or connection. The cable itself is longer than standard three feet. In terms of durability, it does you do have to worry about the cable getting frayed or anything. The cable is SUPER thick but pretty easy to consolidate. There is no tie which is a bit of a bummer. A nice thing about the material color is that you cannot see it get visibly dirt which is great. The color of the cable has yet to fade from overall use. The cable is able to transfer about the same speed as a traditional type c to type c cable or at thunderbolt speeds. This did work as a charging cable for my mac but only when I needed it to be. I would not actually recommend using this for that purpose unless it is your only option. Overall I think this cable is pretty nice. It is longer than your traditional cable but not by much. It is a thicker but definitely not the most durable cable. It actually frayed a little bit which is annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this for multiple devices and have had no issues. Transfer speeds are incredibly fast compared to other USB-C data cables I have

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Belkin Cable
reviews.reviewText: I always rely on on Belkin to provide me with high quality cables. This Thunderbolt 4 cable is no exception. It gets the job done providing me with a reliable Thunderbolt connection between my Mac-mini and my 4K Dell monitor. My only issue with this cable is that it's very expensive for what it is. However if you want a reliable connection with your equipment I guess you have to pay the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to report. Works great for connecting my 2018 Macbook Pro to my thunderbolt dock. At one point I was able to connect 3 screens over this single cable! Remarkable.
Eu já tinha feito uma devolução de um cabo supostamente Thunderbolt 4, que não funcionou ligando minha placa de áudio ao meu iMac novo. Este foi ligar e funcionou. Recomendo
Barato en comparación con el original aún no he probado la velocidad

reviews.reviewTitle: They work all right with mac
reviews.reviewText: I've got these cables because the original cables included with Pegasus RAIDs, were unstable. They'd disconnect at the slightest move. These are thunderbolt4, while the pegasus are thunderbolt3, However, they work all right, and don't disconnect at the slightest move. I was tired of the connection being lost when repositioning the computer, even by a tiny bit. These cables are firmer, and the connection speed works all right.
